trans-unit.source: This article uses the Azure Preview portal
trans-unit.target: This article uses the Azure Preview portal

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>Preview portal</linkText><title></title></link> provides access to new features and experiences on the Azure platform, and is required when using the steps and information provided in this article.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>Preview portal</linkText><title></title></link> provides access to new features and experiences on the Azure platform, and is required when using the steps and information provided in this article.

trans-unit.source: If you are not currently logged into your Azure subscription, you will be prompted to log in when you visit the <link><linkText>Preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If you are not currently logged into your Azure subscription, you will be prompted to log in when you visit the <link><linkText>Preview portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
